thread.title: Zookeeper assaults zookeeper over love triangle with fellow zook -
thread.title_full: Zookeeper assaults zookeeper over love triangle with fellow zook - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Joe Rawley, Producer
title: Zookeeper assaults zookeeper over love triangle with fellow zook -
text:
(WVUE, AP) - A former employee at the London Zoo must pay $1,200 compensation to one of her former coworkers, after attacking her with a wine glass.
According to court documents, meerkat expert Caroline Westlake assaulted monkey handler Kate Sanders, during a dispute over Adam Davies, the zoo’s llama-keeper, who had dated both women.
The incident happened during a zoo Christmas party on Dec. 8. Westlake claimed Sanders punched her first, and didn’t remember attacking her with a wine glass.
Sanders sustained facial in the attack.
Judge Jeremy Colman sentenced Westlake to 12 months of community service for the assault.
The zoo fired Westlake after the incident.
Copyright 2015 WVUE.
